Message:
No way...
The power of a witch?
The legend was true...

As those men watched me,
the looks in their eyes changed.

But, if it’s a witch
that they’re looking for...

I slowly made my
way towards them.

As I pleaded with them,
they unveiled a crown.

It marks a living sacrifice,
supressing the power of
the witch who wears it.

There’s a similar crown
in my village.

I heard that it allowed them
to imprison the witch who
once founded our village.

The one in the village
no longer contains
any of that power,
but I was scared of it
since long ago.

Still, Rean served me
like she was my knight...

Since then,
I stopped being scared...
of the legend, and the crown.

Rean turned everything into
memories I treasured.
